Tomorrow's Racecards | Tuesday 12th August 2025

Our detailed racecards are the ultimate guide to tomorrow’s Horse Racing in the UK, Ireland and overseas. You can check out all the runners and riders on the At The Races racecard which has everything you need to know including latest form, tips, statistics, and breeding information plus latest odds and betting from a selection of leading bookmakers. We've also customised the US racecards into a UK format to help punters less familiar with racing in North America.

To get started just select one of tomorrow’s racecards from the listing below of tomorrow’s meetings. You can also access today’s racecards here or use the date picker above to view racecards for meetings in the future.
